name: iFistHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, set living room light to fifty percent”
”Alexa, change kitchen light to blue”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
IFIST TECH Smart Light brings intelligent lighting control to your home through Alexa. This skill allows you to control your IFIST TECH RGB smart bulbs using simple voice commands.

To use this skill, you'll need:
• IFIST TECH RGB smart bulb
• Active internet connection
• IFIST TECH account
• Alexa-enabled device

Key Features:
• Turn your lights on and off with voice commands
• Adjust brightness levels (0-100%)
• Control RGB colors
• Set color temperature
• Group control for multiple bulbs
• Real-time status updates

Getting Started:

Purchase IFIST TECH RGB smart bulb from [your website/authorized retailers]
Download the IFIST life app from App Store or Google Play
Create an account and set up your device
Enable this skill and link your IFIST Life account
Discover your devices in the Alexa app
For setup assistance or technical support, visit [your support website] or contact our customer service at design@ifist.tech.

Note: This skill requires IFIST TECH hardware and a IFIST life account to function. Some features may require firmware updates. Voice control availability may vary by region and language.
